perturbation.original_text: 1.1 ADVERTISING shall mean any paid advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site, but excluding Advertising that is not paid for or which is part of an overall partnering or revenue sharing arrangement and any Product Listings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 Marketing shall mean any paid advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site. However, Marketing excludes any activity that is not paid for, is part of an overall partnering or revenue-sharing arrangement, or involves Product Listings.
perturbation.explanation: The original text uses 'Advertising' with a specific exclusion. The modified text uses 'Marketing' without clearly defining its relation to 'Advertising', making it uncertain if they are the same. This could lead to disputes over what falls under revenue-sharing arrangements that should be excluded.

perturbation.original_text: 4.5 From time to time during the Term, Neoforma shall provide Qualified Leads to VerticalNet for job listings for inclusion, at VerticalNet's then current listing rate, in the Co-Branded Career Center and, in VerticalNet's sole discretion, on any other VerticalNet Site. VerticalNet shall be responsible for, and shall have sole control of, all credit, billing and collection in connection with the Qualified Leads. Neoforma shall have no authority to make collections on behalf of VerticalNet.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.5 From time to time during the Term, Neoforma shall submit Potential Candidates to VerticalNet for job advertisements for inclusion, at VerticalNet's listing costs, in the Joint Career Platform and, in VerticalNet's consideration, on any other VerticalNet Site. VerticalNet shall be liable for, and shall maintain total control of, all credit, billing, and revenue in connection with the Potential Candidates. Neoforma shall have authority to make revenue collections on behalf of VerticalNet.
perturbation.explanation: The original text defines 'Qualified Leads' and states Neoforma has no authority to make collections. The modified text introduces 'Potential Candidates,' a 'Joint Career Platform' and grants Neoforma authority to make revenue collections, contradicting the original terms and obligations, creating confusion about Neoforma's role.

perturbation.original_text: 10.3.1 During each 12 month period during the Initial Term that commences on the Effective Date or an anniversary of the Effective Date (each, a "Contract Year"), commissions shall accrue in an amount equal to [*] of any Medical Products Net Revenues during such Contract Year resulting from (a) any VerticalNet Medical Products Listing or (b) any Neoforma Medical Products Listing for which VerticalNet was the Transaction Origination Party. From and after the point when such accrued commissions equal [*] in any Contract Year (such [*] of accrued commissions shall not be payable by Neoforma), Neoforma shall pay to VerticalNet commissions equal to [*] of any Medical Products Net Revenues during such Contract Year resulting from (a) any VerticalNet Medical Products Listing or (b) any Neoforma Medical Products Listing for which VerticalNet was the Transaction Origination Party.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.3.1 During each 12 month period during the Initial Term that commences on the Effective Date or an anniversary of the Effective Date (each, a "Contract Year"), payments will be calculated as [*] of any Medical Products Net Sales during such Contract Year resulting from (a) any VerticalNet Medical Products Listing or (b) any Neoforma Medical Products Listing for which VerticalNet was the Initial Contact. From and after the point when such payments equal [*] in any Contract Year (such [*] is a discount for marketing and sales), Neoforma will transfer to VerticalNet payments equal to [*] of any Medical Products Net Sales during such Contract Year resulting from (a) any VerticalNet Medical Products Listing or (b) any Neoforma Medical Products Listing for which VerticalNet cultivated the Opportunity.
perturbation.explanation: The original text focuses on 'commissions' based on 'Transaction Origination Party'. The modified version changes 'commissions' to 'payments,' 'Net Revenues' to 'Net Sales,' 'Transaction Origination Party' to 'Initial Contact' and 'cultivated the Opportunity', and describes a portion of the 'payments' as a 'discount for marketing and sales'. This creates ambiguity in the calculation of amounts due, as 'Net Sales' and 'cultivated the Opportunity' are not defined, differing from the original contract's clear definition of 'Net Revenues' and 'Transaction Origination Party'.
